subject: IRREVOCABLE COMPENSATION/INHER
body:
IRREVOCABLE COMPENSATION/INHERITANCE PAYMENT FROM IMF OFFICE.
Good Day
Have you received Your Approved International Monetary Funds
compensation/ inheritance unclaimed funds payment of
US$1,880,000.00?.
You have been contacted several times no response to enable receive
your funds  beneficiary/ inheritance funds years back before now.If
you have received your total funds as approved by IMF kindly indicate
for directives to contact your approved paying bank immediately.
Get back to us immediately for more details.Payment has a time limit on
phase 1 and Phase 2 payments as directed by the IMF Office.
Congratulations.
Thank you.
Mrs Zenia Smith
Payment International Monetary Fund Department,

subject: Re: IRREVOCABLE COMPENSATION/INHER
body:
Hello Mrs. Zenia Smith,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must admit, this is quite a surprise! I wasn't aware that there were any funds waiting for me. Could you please provide more details about these funds? How did they come to be approved by the IMF? 

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Cathy
